item.title: B, an ugly Bitwarden CLI
item.description: b is (an ugly) a tool that allows you to copy your Bitwarden/Vaultwarden password directly from your terminal. Demo Dependencies bw (Bitwarden cli) xclip jq fzf fzf-tmux Installation You need to create a Bitwarden token, check documentation here. Then set variables in b script. # Fill these vars export BW_CLIENTID='' export BW_CLIENTSECRET='' export BW_PASSWORD='' Finally move b file to /usr/local/bin. sudo mv b /usr/local/bin Usage Search for a password :
